function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased recreational activity during lockdown","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease spread due to increased human interaction","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing measures and promote outdoor safety guidelines","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras and geospatial analysis to monitor crowd density","People":"General public","Owner":"Local government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"High population density near recreational trail segments","Impact":"Increased transmission risk of contagious diseases among densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Limit the number of people on the trails and enforce mask-wearing and hygiene measures","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis to identify high-density areas and deploy monitoring systems","People":"Residents near the recreational trail segments","Owner":"Local government and trail maintenance authorities"},{"Description":"Increase in cycling activity during lockdown","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease spread due to increased human movement","Mitigation":"Encourage the use of less crowded cycling routes, provide guidance on safe riding practices","Technologies":"Digital mapping tools to identify less crowded routes, surveillance cameras to monitor crowded areas","People":"Cyclists and general public","Owner":"Local government and cycling advocacy groups"}]}
